statement:
[@lang; @mukherjea] Let $(X_i)_{i\in I}$ be a family of topological
spaces. Then the product space $$\prod_{i\in I}X_i$$ with the product
topology is connected if and only if each space $X_i$ is connected.

As is true of most results in topology involving products, the forward
implication requires the axiom of choice.

[9]{} S. Lang, *Analysis II*, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company Inc.,
1969. A. Mukherjea, K. Pothoven, *Real and Functional Analysis*, Plenum
Press, 1978.
